interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sam&Helen Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit, 5Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes And 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliners With Eyelash Applicator-No Glue Needed
Review Date: 2020/06/22
Store: Sam&Helen
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Sam&Helen', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have a few friends who have tried similar products and I was curious.  The liner is thick and has almost a rubbery feel.  Even with makeup remover I found it quite challenging to remove.  Make sure to mix it before applying.  It took me three coats to get the lashes to stay.  Make sure to let it dry all the way.  The lash options are helpful to get the right look.
Review Title: challenging to remove
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Sam&Helen Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit, 5Pairs Magnetic Eyelashes And 2 Tubes Magnetic Eyeliners With Eyelash Applicator-No Glue Needed
Sam&Helen
{'Brand': 'Sam&Helen', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Gluten Free', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.71 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'}
I have a few friends who have tried similar products and I was curious.  The liner is thick and has almost a rubbery feel.  Even with makeup remover I found it quite challenging to remove.  Make sure to mix it before applying.  It took me three coats to get the lashes to stay.  Make sure to let it dry all the way.  The lash options are helpful to get the right look.
challenging to remove
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Preferences:** The user favors modern, straight hairstyles, particularly in bold colors like burgundy and ombre shades. They value ease of use and a natural appearance in hair products.
  
- **Material Preference:** Prefers synthetic hair that mimics human hair quality, especially heat-resistant options.
  
- **Functional Features:** Appreciates realistic styling features such as pre-plucking and baby hair, reflecting a desire for authenticity in their beauty products.
  
- **Review Focus:** The user emphasizes aesthetics, ease of application, and overall product satisfaction, particularly regarding weight and presentation. There’s also a growing interest in beauty tools that enhance convenience and user experience.

- **Recent Interaction:** The user reviewed a magnetic eyelash kit, noting both positive and challenging aspects. Despite the product's aesthetic appeal and utility, they found the removal process difficult, leading to a slightly lower rating of 3.0. This suggests a continued priority for convenience alongside practicality in their beauty regimen.

- **Review Trend:** The user typically rates products around the 4.0 mark but is willing to assign lower ratings when products do not meet expectations. This indicates a focus on quality and ease of use across all beauty applications.

Overall, the user maintains a holistic approach to beauty, prioritizing style, convenience, and product quality in both hair-related purchases and broader beauty tools.
